description: ad- +‎ position, from Latin adpositio, from adpositum, past participle of adponere, an alternative form of apponere (“to put near”).

entries.meaning: (grammar) An element that combines syntactically with a phrase and indicates how that phrase should be interpreted in the surrounding context; a preposition or postposition.
